name: Space Exit
shortDescription: A fast-paced, sci-fi endless runner game where a futuristic character runs through a space tunnel collecting coins and diamonds.
fullDescription: Space Exit is a 3D endless runner set within a futuristic, neon-lit space tunnel. Players control a character in a sci-fi suit, navigating the tubular environment from a third-person, over-the-shoulder perspective. The primary objective is to achieve a high score and collect two forms of in-game currency: gold Coins and green Diamonds. The gameplay is fast and requires quick reflexes to avoid obstacles and gather currency, with scores and collectibles tracked in real-time.
